description: Footnotes checklist extracts only \f markers, not \x cross-references

structure.rowCountVariable: Depends on number of footnotes in Matthew 1-5

expectedBehavior.referenceAssignment: Reference is the verse containing the footnote
expectedBehavior.contentDisplay: Full footnote content including caller and text

verificationNotes: Multiple footnotes in same verse may create multiple rows
Footnote content includes all nested markers (\ft, \fk, etc.)
Reference points to verse containing the footnote
